```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(igraph)
```

```{r}
# load the csv data
following_network <- read.csv("following network.csv", header = TRUE, as.is = TRUE)
metadata <- read.csv("metadata.csv", header = TRUE, as.is = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Create a graph from the following network data
og <- graph_from_data_frame(d = following_network, vertices = metadata, directed = FALSE)
summary(og)
```
```{r}
# Plot the graph
plot(og,
     vertex.label = V(og)$name, 
     vertex.size = sqrt(V(og)$Followers)/10, 
     edge.width = 0.5,
     vertex.label.cex = 0.5,
     curved = TRUE,
     layout = layout_with_fr(og)
)

```
